mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TBL(REPLY_NO, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_NO, PARENT_REPLY_NO, REPLY_ORDER,REPLY_DEPTH,EMPL_ID,REPLY_CONTENTS,WRITE_DATE,STATUS) VALUES(BOARD_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{boardCode },#{boardNo},BOARD_REPLY_SEQ.CURRVAL,0,0,#{emplId},#{replyContents},DEFAULT,DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO REPLY_TBL(REPLY_NO, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_NO, PARENT_REPLY_NO, REPLY_ORDER,REPLY_DEPTH,EMPL_ID,REPLY_CONTENTS,WRITE_DATE,STATUS) VALUES(BOARD_REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{boardCode },#{boardNo},#{parentReplyNo},(SELECT MAX(REPLY_ORDER)+1 FROM REPLY_TBL WHERE PARENT_REPLY_NO = #{parentReplyNo}),1,#{emplId},#{replyContents},DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REPLY_TBL WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo } AND BOARD_CODE= #{boardCode} AND STATUS='Y' ORDER BY PARENT_REPLY_NO, REPLY_ORDER
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY_TBL SET STATUS='N' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
UPDATE REPLY_TBL SET REPLY_CONTENTS = #{replyContents} WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
